meanings.definition: A group of compounds found in turmeric.
meanings.sent1: Curcumins are natural substances that give turmeric its yellow color.
meanings.sent2: I added curcumins to my curry to enhance the flavor.
meanings.sent3: The curcumins in turmeric were having a party, turning everything yellow!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as curcumins, lighting up the room.
meanings.sent5: The curcumins danced in the dish, bringing a burst of color to the meal.

meanings.sent1: Curcumins are what make turmeric so beneficial for health.
meanings.sent2: Doctors recommend consuming curcumins for their anti-inflammatory properties.
meanings.sent3: The curcumins in the spice rack were always the center of attention.
meanings.sent4: His words were as potent as curcumins, leaving a lasting impact.
meanings.sent5: The curcumins worked their magic, improving the overall well-being of the body.

meanings.sent1: Including curcumins in your diet can help fight off harmful free radicals.
meanings.sent2: Curcumins are known for their ability to protect cells from damage.
meanings.sent3: The curcumins in the smoothie were on a mission to battle the antioxidants.
meanings.sent4: Her presence was like curcumins, bringing a sense of protection and care.
meanings.sent5: The curcumins acted as a shield, safeguarding the body from oxidative stress.
